review: During our holiday visit last week we visited Ananta - voted best Indian restaurant in Madrid. We went and tried the tasting menu.Oh man.. it was so tasty....

name: Meson Gallego
address: Plaza Remonta, 2, 28039 Madrid, Spain
review: We stopped by on a recommendation from a friend working at the Melia Castilla. Wow...the owner greeted us and made some fabulous suggestions. We started out.... Very short walk from the Melia Castilla. Delicious Pulpo de La Gallega, garlic soup, lamb chops and some of the best chorizo sausage Links I've ever had.....
